  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.kohsuke.github.authorization.OrgAppInstallationAuthorizationProvider
    org.kohsuke.github.connector.GitHubConnectorResponse.ByteArrayResponse
    Inherit directly from GitHubConnectorResponse.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.kohsuke.github.GHAppInstallation.createToken(Map<String, GHPermissionType>)
    Use GHAppInstallation.createToken() instead.
    org.kohsuke.github.GHAppInstallation.listRepositories()
    This method cannot work on a GHAppInstallation retrieved from GHApp.listInstallations() (for example), except when resorting to unsupported hacks involving setRoot(GitHub) to switch from an application client to an installation client. This method will be removed. You should instead use an installation client (with an installation token, not a JWT), retrieve a GHAuthenticatedAppInstallation from GitHub.getInstallation(), then call GHAuthenticatedAppInstallation.listRepositories().
    org.kohsuke.github.GHContent.getContent()
    Use GHContent.read()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHContent.getEncodedContent()
    Use GHContent.read()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHGist.getId()
    Use GHGist.getGistId() instead.
    org.kohsuke.github.GHMyself.getEmails()
    Use GHMyself.listEmails()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHMyself.getEmails2()
    Use GHMyself.listEmails()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHObject.getResponseHeaderFields()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHPerson.listRepositories(int)
    Use #listRepositories().withPageSize() instead.
    org.kohsuke.github.GHPullRequest.createReviewComment(String, String, String, int)
    use GHPullRequest.createReviewComment()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHRepository.fork()
    Use GHRepository.createFork()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHRepository.forkTo(GHOrganization)
    Use GHRepository.createFork()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHRepository.getPullRequests(GHIssueState)
    Use GHRepository.queryPullRequests()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHRepository.listStargazers2()
    Use GHRepository.listStargazers()
    org.kohsuke.github.GHTeamBuilder.permission(GHOrganization.Permission)
    see https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/rest/teams/teams?apiVersion=2022-11-28#create-a-team
    org.kohsuke.github.GHTreeBuilder.shaEntry(String, String, boolean)
    use GHTreeBuilder.add(String, String, boolean) or GHTreeBuilder.add(String, byte[], boolean) instead.
    org.kohsuke.github.GHTreeBuilder.textEntry(String, String, boolean)
    use GHTreeBuilder.add(String, String, boolean) or GHTreeBuilder.add(String, byte[], boolean) instead.
    org.kohsuke.github.GitHub.lastRateLimit()
    implement a RateLimitChecker and add it via GitHubBuilder.withRateLimitChecker(RateLimitChecker).
    org.kohsuke.github.GitHub.rateLimit()
    implement a RateLimitChecker and add it via GitHubBuilder.withRateLimitChecker(RateLimitChecker).
